survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Car Rental Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently used car rental services to evaluate their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall car rental experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall car rental experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your satisfaction? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to identify key drivers of satisfaction.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your satisfaction? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use our car rental service again in the future?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to measure likelihood of repeat business.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use our car rental service again in the future?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your rental experience.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on negative experiences.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your rental experience.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: What additional services or features would you like to see offered by our car rental service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional services or features would you like to see offered by our car rental service?
